channel.title: How do i make it so staff can't kick/jail (etc.) higher staff. (EX mod jailadmin
channel.description: I just made a server and my mods keep on jailing the admins. I want to change it so they can only jail people lower than them. Please help. THANK YOU

item.title: How do i make it so staff can't kick/jail (etc.) higher staff. (EX mod jailadmin
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Brutal I am Brutal
item.description:
@I_am_Brutal wrote:

I’m not an avid coder, but if you want a simple fix just disallow your mods from jailing admins by making jail admin+
Or just get better mods that don’t jail your admins… lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so staff can't kick/jail (etc.) higher staff. (EX mod jailadmin
